command.name: docs-related-cli
command.description: Generate/update documentation for git-changed modules using CLI execution with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini->qwen->codex fallback, <15 modules uses direct parallel

intent.primary_user_value: Generate/update docs for only git-changed modules (and parent contexts) using CLI execution with batching and tool fallback.

reads: repo source files for affected modules

must_not: no execution without explicit user confirmation
no destructive operations unless explicitly requested
